text: Welcome to our application! By using our application, you agree to the terms of this User Agreement (hereinafter - 'Agreement'). Please read the text of the Agreement carefully before starting to use the application.

children.text: This Agreement regulates the relationship between You ('User') and Us ('Company') in connection with the use of the application.
The Company provides the User with access to the application on the terms set forth in this Agreement.
By using the application, the User confirms that he/she has read, understood, and accepts all the terms of the Agreement.
The Company provides the User with access to the application for personal non-commercial use.
The User undertakes to use the application in accordance with its purpose and the terms of this Agreement.

header: Rights and Obligations of the Parties

children.text: The Company undertakes to:
Ensure the availability of the application for the User 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, except for the time necessary for maintenance and repair work.
Take measures to protect the User's personal data in accordance with applicable law.
The User undertakes to use the application in accordance with its purpose and the terms of this Agreement.
Use the application only for personal non-commercial purposes.
Not take any actions aimed at hacking, modifying, overloading, or otherwise interfering with the operation of the application.
Not distribute malicious programs or materials that violate the rights of third parties.
All intellectual property rights related to the application belong to the Company.
The User has no right to copy, modify, distribute, transmit, display, reproduce, or create derivative works based on the application without the prior written consent of the Company.
The Company is not responsible for any losses or damages arising from the use of the application.
The Company does not guarantee that the application will work without errors or interruptions.
The Company is not responsible for the actions or inaction of third parties that have led to a violation of this Agreement.
The Company undertakes to maintain the confidentiality of the User's personal data in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
The User agrees to the processing of his/her personal data in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

header: Term and Termination of the Agreement

children.text: This Agreement enters into force from the moment the User starts using the application and is valid until its termination.
The Company has the right to unilaterally terminate the Agreement in case of the User's violation of its terms.
This Agreement is governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the country where the Company is registered.
All disputes arising from this Agreement or in connection with it are subject to resolution in court at the location of the Company.
